sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import "./style.css";
import { Form, Input, TextArea, Button, Message } from "semantic-ui-react";

const FormExampleFieldControlId = () => (
  <Form
    action="mailto:charr.mt@gmail.com"
    method="post"
    enctype="text/plain"
    className="formF"
    inverted
  >
    <Form.Group to="address@gmail.com" widths="equal">
      <Form.Field
        type="text"
        name="name"
        className="form"
        id="form-input-control-first-name"
        control={Input}
        label="Name"
      />
      <Form.Field
        type="text"
        name="mail"
        id="form-input-control-last-name"
        control={Input}
        label="E-mail"
      />
    </Form.Group>
    <Form.Field
      type="text"
      name="comment"
      id="form-textarea-control-opinion"
      control={TextArea}
      label="Message"

      
    />
    <Message
      success
      header="Form Completed"
      content="You're all signed up for the newsletter"
    />
    <Form.Field control={Button} icon="mail" />
  </Form>
);

export default FormExampleFieldControlId;
